entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
